overview:
A seasoned kite surfer, adventure traveller and online marketing professional Tim is the founder of Adventure Sports Holidays (www.adventuresportsholidays.com) and Extreme Element (www.exelement.co.uk). Capitalising on his personal passions for international travel, adventure activities and anything that gets the heart pumping, Tim has grown his companies into industry leaders over the past 6 years.

Well known as an avid entrepreneur and outspoken adventure sports enthusiast, Tim’s staff are accustomed to frequently sending out rescue parties to drag him back into the office after he has managed to sneak out to indulge in his other passion in life, kite surfing.

Even with his many recreational pursuits Tim’s success with ASH speaks for itself. The site now boasts over 6000 different adventure sports holidays, and has already assisted over 100,000 customers get started on their adventure of a lifetime, which is why they have quickly become the authority on everything relating to adventure holidays. Not bad for a company formed in 2004 for the pure enjoyment of fellow adventure sports fans.

His other business www.exelement.co.uk has now become the leading extreme sports agency in the UK and Spain. With its cool brand, strong online presence and retail deals in the top 4 UK Supermarkets, Extreme Element has grown rapidly since its inception in 2006, now offering over 800 extreme experiences at over 300 centres in the UK & Spain.
